TABLE.NAME: sits_mappings
TABLE.COMMENT: Each row represents a specific SITS module or program cohort, the members of which are mapped to the course referred to by courseid

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle course id to which to map a cohort

FIELD.NAME: acyear
FIELD.COMMENT: Academic year of mapped cohort in SITS format (eg '2010/1')

FIELD.NAME: period_code
FIELD.COMMENT: SITS period code of mapped cohort, null if it is a program cohort.

FIELD.NAME: year_group
FIELD.COMMENT: SITS year group, null if it is a module cohort

FIELD.NAME: start_date
FIELD.COMMENT: Date assignments should start, DateTime format

FIELD.NAME: end_date
FIELD.COMMENT: Date assignments should end, DateTime format

FIELD.NAME: default_map
FIELD.COMMENT: Is this the current default cohort for the course - values must be 1 (true) or 0 (false)

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of the mapped cohort

FIELD.NAME: manual
FIELD.COMMENT: Is this a manual enrollment, 0 or 1, boolean

FIELD.NAME: specified
FIELD.COMMENT: Is this a specified enrollment, 0 or 1, boolean

FIELD.NAME: active
FIELD.COMMENT: Is this an active mapping, 0 or 1, boolean

FIELD.NAME: map_id
FIELD.COMMENT: sits_mappings id

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle user id of they who made the change

FIELD.NAME: action
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the type of action

FIELD.NAME: method
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the unenrol method

FIELD.NAME: end_date
FIELD.COMMENT: Date assignments should end, DateTime format

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: DateTime string timestamp

TABLE.NAME: sits_mappings_enrols
TABLE.COMMENT: Each record related a mapping to both an enrol and a role assignment

TABLE.NAME: sits_categories
TABLE.COMMENT: Relates SITS department instances with Moodle categories

FIELD.NAME: category_id
FIELD.COMMENT: course_categories key

FIELD.NAME: sits_dep_code
FIELD.COMMENT: SITS department code

TABLE.NAME: sits_period
TABLE.COMMENT: Each row represents dates for a specific SITS period code

FIELD.NAME: period_code
FIELD.COMMENT: SITS period code of mapped cohort, null if it is a program cohort.

FIELD.NAME: acyear
FIELD.COMMENT: Academic year of mapped cohort in SITS format (eg '2010/1')

FIELD.NAME: start_date
FIELD.COMMENT: Date assignments should start, DateTime format

FIELD.NAME: end_date
FIELD.COMMENT: Date assignments should end, DateTime format

FIELD.NAME: revert
FIELD.COMMENT: Revert to SITS, 0 or 1, boolean

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: DateTime string timestamp
